1.0.0.name: wordpress/servicemagic-uk-affiliate
1.0.0.description:
Why download the ServiceMagic UK Plugin

The ServiceMagic UK plugin allows you to easily install all the ServiceMagic forms onto your site. The plugin is fully customizable, which means you can build the forms to match the look and feel of your site. This can have a positive impact on your conversion rates. An automatic update! Keep in contact with your affiliate manager to get the latest updates. The ServiceMagic UK plugin benefits from automatic updates as well as regular updates. The ServiceMagic UK plugin was designed to simplify the integration of our quote forms on your Wordpress site. This is the quickest way to get started and earn revenue from the ServiceMagic affiliate program. Why should you join the ServiceMagic affiliate program? You can offer your site users the service to compare multiple home improvement quotes. This allows you to monetize your traffic and earn revenue at the same time. For more information, please visit our website
